pages.title: Relics
pages.text: $(l)Relics$() are items that are collectible in sets to extend your time in The Vault. $(br2)Relics can be identified from $(l)Unidentified Relic Fragments$().

A $(l)Relic Pedestal$() is required to assemble the Relic. $(br2)Each uniquely completed Relic Set grants $(l)30 additional seconds$() to the Vault Timer. Crafting a Relic Set a second time does not grant any additional time. Duplicate relic sets can be smelted for a $(l)Bitter Lemon$(), which grants 30 additional seconds to the Vault Timer.
